law.catch_line: Department may prescribe rules and regulations.
law.text: The department may make and promulgate rules and regulations necessary to effectuate the purpose of KRS 180.320 to 180.340.
law.history: Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. sec. 4356zb-6.
